data.title: Palladium
data.meta_description: Linda Diane (McGee) Herron \n Richmond, IN - Linda Diane (McGee) Herron 59 of Richmond died May 15, 2016 at her home...
data.text:
Linda Diane (McGee) Herron

Richmond, IN - Linda Diane (McGee) Herron 59 of Richmond died May 15, 2016 at her home after a brave battle with cancer. She was the adored daughter of Robert H. and Ruby R. Sturgis McGee. She was born July 19, 1956 in Richmond and lived here all her life except for periods when she joined her husband while he was in the military serving in Norfolk, Virginia and Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

She was a 1974 graduate of Richmond High School. She worked at Friends Fellowship Community in the dietary department. She studied to become a CNA and worked at various nursing homes in Richmond. Linda also worked for Richmond Community Schools.

She was the loving wife of Dennis Herron and proud and loving mother of Deana Herron; other survivors include her mother and one brother David Chamberlin. She was preceded in death by a stillborn child, one baby daughter Dana, her father, and one brother Greg McGee.

Graveside services will be 3:30 PM Sunday May 22, 2016 at Willow Grove Cemetery with Chaplain Rick Alvey officiating. Friends may call from 12:00 PM to 3:00 PM Sunday at Stegall-Berheide-Orr Funeral Home. Linda's family would like to have family and friends join them for dinner at the Druids Lodge 123 South 8th Street Richmond to share memories of her life. Memorial contributions may be given to; Help the Animals 2101 West Main Street Richmond, Indiana 47374. Condolences may be sent to the family via the guest book at www.stegallberheideorr.com.
